data.message: Love this song, Yelawolf is so underrated

replies.message: Eminem is my favorite artist, but Yelawolf is highly underrated

No-I think you mean yela is OVERRATED,like the assembly line rappers,like him,tell me how long u think he will last?Not even close to as long as em.In the us,I have no idea who 99% of the rappers are that come out daily,and there gone just as quick,in canada,when a musician,of any genre comes out,they usually last,we don't have so many assembly line music.Probably why people bash justin beiber all the time-he is a success,and young.He has already been around for years,beiber hasn't fuckd up like so many other young musicians,he hasn't gone to jail,been in rehab,he hasn't been one of those stars-so-I guess americans-or tards-just can't stand someone young talented and a success.If j b was a fag,how come he is sleeping with the most pretty girls he wants,fucking jealous haters,quite,and keep paying rent for ur parents basement lmfao!

in fairness,in canada we have haters-seems more in the us tho,why-u guys so insecure,because the world doesn't like americans,it's not cuz there jealous,it's cuz u guys have such a bad attitude-u think usa is the shit!U are the bully of the world,if u are a canadian,people love u everywhere in the world-cuz we don't hate,we get along and don't look down on every country.lmfao..................
Usa is a nice place to visit-but as fuck if I would EVER live there.
https://www.gofundme.com/c456x2gc please help my friend god bless
